translations: v.用计算机做，使计算机化；给（某物）安装计算机，用电脑装备（某物）；把……输入计算机，用电脑储存

sentences.sentence: Under different operation environment and executive subject, the computerizes accounting information system, changes have taken place in the feature of internal control point.
sentences.translation: 会计信息系统在不同运行环境下，由于会计业务执行主体的演变，使得内部控制的特点发生了变化。
